descriptionHtml:
Here is the mod you have been waiting for... ( At least if you've seen the YTP and know what I'm talking about here :D )
The acid Heimskr from Znarftarf's, "[color=#ffff00]Youtube Poop - (2K Subs Special) - Znarftarf the Orc Barbarian (A Skyrim YTP)[/color]" ! 
Now your Heimskr will now spout references from the YTP instead of his basic preaching about Talos! 
Visiting Whiterun afterwards have never been so fun! 

[FEATURES]:
[ 14 different lines of funny shit for Heimskr to say. ]

No DLC needed. 
Compatible with everything else that don't edit Heimskr's preaching scene dialogue. 

[[color=#ff0000]This mod removes voice acting from his other dialogue, a necessary sacrifice, since I cannot/don't know how to edit the "MaleNord" voicetype, which
Heimskr uses, I had to make a new one to give him the new voice[/color].] 

This is my first mod. 
English is not my main language. 

Hope you enjoy!
author: Jonizeus
